name: Never Ending Cave
description:
GAME INFO

Never Ending Cave is a short horror game made in 72 hours for the  Ludum Dare 48 Event. In this game you wake up in a cave. You soon realise that you are not alone in the cave and you have to find a way to get out. A 15-20 minutes long horror game. If you enjoy playing it leave a comment :D

 CONTROLS 

- WASD = Move

- SHIFT = Run

- "E" = Interact / Close note

- "F" = Flashlight

 CREDITS

- Programming and Project setup made by Tudypie

- 3D models from sketchfab

- Sound Effects & Music from zapsplat
